introduction: SYNOPSISJung-hee remains single until thirty after being betrayed by a man in her college days. She marries obstetrician Joon-tae, a man in his early 40's, who has been divorced for eight years. But she has an affair with his friend Joon-kyu, when he fails to satisfy her sexually. Joon-tae confesses to the guilt-ridden Jung-hee that he's the one that got Joon-kyu to sleep with her for his own pleasure. She begins to hate all men especially her husband and burns with the desire to take revenge. She soon disappears to the shock of Joon-tae. He becomes paralyzed from a car accident while trying to find her. Joon-kyu defends Joon-tae but Jung-hee, who has given up hope plays a dangerous game and ends up getting killed.故事男人不信任的大学恋爱是30岁年龄的男子被背叛后的Carissa jinaedeon一个单身汉在40年代初结婚了严重的妇科医生求爱是juntae离婚八年之后。但她不满的性关系的感觉与她的丈夫承担她的丈夫与晚辈jungyu事。假虎被内疚juntae感困扰是一拖带着jungyu令人震惊的结束了自己的性满足。对所有的男人为她的丈夫假虎假虎面对仇恨和报复已经消失juntae寻找的是在一次交通事故中蔬菜。Jungyu将捍卫juntae但绝望的假虎状态最终死于打了一场危险的游戏。
